Class CloudComment

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CounterAction
      • core.CloudComment

  • public class CloudComment
extends CounterAction
    Popup a cloud with text in it, like the waifu is speaking.
    Author:
    csiki

        public void setComment(java.lang.String comment)
